column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.3
#Text=Goliath Partners is working with a new leading exchange backed by Jump Capital & Sequoia that is looking for a Core Software Engineer.
#Text=The role is 100% remote and they have offices in New York, Sydney and England.
#Text=The firm has already reached $15B in accumulated trades on it's platform...
#Text=Role:\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Developing trading infrastructure.
#Text=Data structures, algorithm development & work on distributed systems.
#Text=Exchange gateway connectivity.
#Text=Essential skills:\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Looking for a Junior to Mid level professional that has graduated in recent years, ideally with a BS in CompSci or similarly related field.
#Text=C, C++ experience.
#Text=Prior/ current experience working at a trading shop (ideally with HFT).
#Text=Interest in Crypto/ De-Fi is a must.
#Text=Comp:\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Our client is looking at paying $140,000-180,000 on the base with equity that brings this up to $220,000-300,000 DOE.

#Text=The equity portion can be monetized after a 1 year cliff unlike other ventures where you don't have it vested for four years (and even then you are waiting for an event/ IPO to make money on it).
#Text=If interested please apply with your most up to date resume and we will be in touch\r
#Text=Looking for a Junior to Mid level professional that has graduated in recent years, ideally with a BS in CompSci or similarly related field\r
#Text=C, C++ experience\r
#Text=Prior/ current experience working at a trading shop (ideally with HFT)\r
#Text=Interest in Crypto/ De-Fi is a mustDeveloping trading infrastructure\r
